address_id.description: Unique identifier for the address associated with the subscription

analytics_data.description: Data related to analytics tracking for the subscription

cancellation_reason_comments.description: Additional comments related to the cancellation reason

cancelled_at.description: Date and time when the subscription was canceled

charge_interval_frequency.description: Frequency at which charges are applied for the subscription

created_at.description: Date and time when the subscription was created

commit_update.description: Indicates if there are pending updates to be committed for the subscription

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer associated with the subscription

email.description: Email address associated with the subscription

expire_after_specific_number_of_charges.description: Number of charges after which the subscription expires

has_queued_charges.description: Indicates if there are queued charges for the subscription

is_prepaid.description: Indicates if the subscription is prepaid

is_skippable.description: Indicates if the subscription can be skipped

is_swappable.description: Indicates if the subscription can be swapped with another product

max_retries_reached.description: Indicates if maximum retry attempts have been reached for charging the subscription

next_charge_scheduled_at.description: Date and time when the next charge is scheduled for the subscription

order_day_of_month.description: Day of the month for the subscription order

order_day_of_week.description: Day of the week for the subscription order

order_interval_frequency.description: Frequency at which subscription orders are placed

order_interval_unit.description: Unit of time used for the subscription order interval

product_title.description: Title of the product associated with the subscription

properties.description: Additional properties related to the subscription

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the subscription

recharge_product_id.description: ID of the product in the Recharge system

shopify_product_id.description: ID of the product in the Shopify system

shopify_variant_id.description: ID of the product variant in the Shopify system

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the product in the subscription

updated_at.description: Date and time when the subscription was last updated

variant_title.description: Title of the product variant in the subscription
